meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gary Roberts Jamey Wiglesworth Lisa Byatt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6587.

td.p: Gary Roberts, a defense consultant from Suffolk, Virginia
Jamey Wiglesworth, a DJ and bar trivia host from Versailles, Kentucky
Lisa Byatt, a technical writer from Amherst, New Hampshire (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,800)

tr.td: (Alex: You have to name the country that is surrounded by the countries we will give you in the clue.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1620 pilgrims established this colony, the first permanent English settlement in New England')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1620 pilgrims established this colony, the first permanent English settlement in New England
